about.title: Discover the Expertise of Trainer Jihad Shojaeha
about.mainDescription: Jihad Shojaeha is a trainer and consulting expert with extensive international experience, delivering thousands of training hours across Palestine, Arab countries, and Europe, including: Jordan, Lebanon, Tunisia, Iraq, Sudan, Netherlands, and Germany

stats.partnerships: Partnerships with organizations like EFE, GIZ, JICA, World Bank
stats.awards: Recipient of local and international awards for his contributions

about.collaborations: Jihad has collaborated with prestigious global institutions such as: Education For Employment (EFE), JICA, GIZ, World Bank, and Swedish Development Agency, in addition to prominent local community institutions
about.recentFocus: In recent years, he has focused on supporting ambitious trainers through effective strategies to secure contracts with local and international institutions and master the paid training market
about.conclusion: Whether you're a trainer starting your journey or a professional looking to expand... Jihad Shojaeha is your true partner for confidently moving towards success

vision.title: My Vision
vision.content: Empowering trainers to transform their expertise into a sustainable income source through paid training and consulting services

mission.title: My Mission
mission.content: Providing high-quality training and consulting programs that help trainers succeed in the paid training market and build their professional careers

expertise.title: Areas of Expertise
items: Training of Trainers (TOT) & American Board Certification
Individual Consulting and Coaching for Trainers
Development of Training Programs for Organizations

achievements.title: Key Achievements
items: Worked in 8+ Arab and European countries
Built partnerships with prestigious international institutions

approach.title: My Working Approach
items: Focus on practical results and application
Custom solutions for each trainee and organization
Using latest training methods and tools

cards.title: Training of Trainers (TOT)
content: üî∏ American Board certified course available via Zoom or recorded sessions.
üî∏ Professional introduction to training from needs analysis to practical projects.
üî∏ Includes creative facilitation, e-training, and international certification with practical application.

cards.title: Individual Consulting & Guidance
content: üî∏ 8-stage individual program over 4 months guiding trainers step by step.
üî∏ Covers field selection, personal branding, identity building, and networking.
üî∏ Professional technical and financial proposal preparation for training contracts.

cards.title: Corporate Training Programs
content: üî∏ Tailored programs for team development including 21st century skills.
üî∏ Skills like critical thinking, leadership, collaboration, emotional intelligence, and career planning.
üî∏ In-house trainer development for managing interactive and impactful sessions.

footer.ctaLine1: Are you ready to start your journey?
footer.ctaLine2: Enter the world of paid training and training contracts.

experience.title: Extensive Experience
experience.description: Trainer and consultant with over 20 years of experience in Palestine, Arab countries, and Europe, delivering over 15,000 training hours and benefiting more than 10,000 trainees.

international.title: International Collaboration
international.description: Worked with global institutions like EFE, JICA, GIZ, World Bank, and Swedish Development Agency, alongside hundreds of local and community institutions.

focus.title: Modern Focus
focus.description: Supporting ambitious trainers to break into the paid training market and secure contracts with local and international institutions using practical tools and strategies.

headerSection3.title: My Training and Consulting Services
headerSection3.subtitle: Comprehensive training and consulting solutions tailored to your needs
